wordGroup: in facsimile 一模一样，逼真

sentences.en: Gordon's painting was an almost perfect facsimile of the original.
sentences.cn: 戈登的绘画简直像是原作的翻版。

sentences.en: B: No problem .I will send you a facsimile with a map and confirmation of reservations.
sentences.cn: 没有问题。 我会寄上地图及订房确认单。

sentences.en: Acer's Iconia dual-screen tablet lacks haptics, but is it a reasonable facsimile of the future of laptops?
sentences.cn: 宏碁的iconia双屏幕平板没有触觉，但是这给未来的笔记本一个很好的摹本了吧？ 一个拥有全虚拟键盘的笔记本不就是一个对折的电脑么。
